search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Acumbamail (acumbamail.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The URL for the official pricing page of Acumbamail is: [https://acumbamail.com/en/pricing/](https://acumbamail.com/en/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

SMS pricing plans
-----------------

Purchase pre-paid credits to send when you need, or purchase a monthly recurring plan. You can even rollover your deliveries if you do not use them all within the month. Consult the [list of 23 countries](https://acumbamail.com/en/pricing/#sms-countries) to which you can send SMS campaigns with Acumbamail.

*   SMS cost0.0463€
*   ObligationNo minimum-term contract
*   Expiry date2 years

Need to send more?
------------------

Check out our unbeatable prices for high volumes. Leave us a contact number and we will call you as soon as possible.

![Image 3: Send text messages so your customers don't miss a thing](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/ilustrations/envia-mensajes-de-texto-illustration.3900bffd3d51.svg)

Countries which you can send SMS with Acumbamail
------------------------------------------------

With your SMS credits, you will be able to send SMS to your subscribers in the following countries without any additional cost.

| Zone 1
 |
| --- |
| Austria

 | Chile

 | Colombia

 |
| Croatia

 | Spain

 | Italy

 |
| Mexico

 | Poland

 | Portugal

 |
| United Kingdom

 |

| Zone 2
 | \*These countries will have a cost of two credits per SMS sent

 |
| --- | --- |
| Germany

 | Belgium

 | Finland

 |
| France

 | Greece

 | Ireland

 |
| Iceland

 | Norway

 | Romania

 |
| Switzerland

 |  |

![Image 4: Customise the email sender](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-customizar-remitente.a637ac19c6f3.svg)

### Customise the email sender

Customize the sender so that your subscribers recognize you and thus increase the opening rate and the efficiency of your messages.

![Image 5: Customise your messages](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-sms.a9eccf3d6dc9.svg)

### Customise your messages

Include custom fields such as the recipient's name to increase the proximity and effectiveness of your campaings.

![Image 6: Create landing pages for your campaigns](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-landing.f4a7b4835e8d.svg)

### Create landing pages for your campaigns

With our editor, you can design and publish [landing pages](https://acumbamail.com/en/landing-pages/) for your campaigns in a few minutes, improving your conversion rate.

![Image 7: Real-time click tracking](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-seguimiento-clicks.8b47981d3af9.svg)

### Real-time click tracking

Monitor the clicks your subscribers make on the URLs included in your messages in order to track your campaign conversions.

![Image 8: Complete reports of your campaigns](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-informes.ca0efcd09c7b.svg)

### Complete reports of your campaigns

Check all the metrics (delivery time, pending delivery, etc.) of your campaign to verify the results obtained and to optimize successive campaigns.

![Image 9: Connect your application with our API](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-api.8d87fcbfee40.svg)

### Connect your application with our API

Through our [SMS sender API](https://acumbamail.com/en/api-sms/) you will be able to connect your platform with Acumbamail and manage your campaigns through it.

![Image 10: Direct sending routes](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-ruta-directa.bd899a595cd9.svg)

### Direct sending routes

Our system connects directly with the operator without going through intermediary networks, which guarantees the delivery of all your SMS messages to the recipient's mobile device.

![Image 11: Unsubscription management](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-gestion-bajas.e928de12bada.svg)

### Unsubscription management

We make it easy for you to manage your subscribers' unsubscribes by easily including a predefined unsubscribe link in your messages.

![Image 12: Personalized support](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/icons/blue/icon-soporte-personalizado.b89229b76e4e.svg)

### Personalized support

[Contact our support team](https://acumbamail.com/en/contact/) and we will answer any questions you may have in the shortest possible time.

Try one of our SMS platforms for free
-------------------------------------

By clicking on the following button we'll give you 5 SMS so you can try out our SMS service.

![Image 13: Try one of our SMS platforms for free](https://acumbamail.com/static/public-theme/img/ilustrations/ilustracion-sms-test-platform.db8ca1745cb2.svg)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on email volume, subscriber count, or SMS volume. Discounts are available for annual plans.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes additional features for small businesses.
